title.full: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN UN STORM Revolution DEMO

description.full: For a limited time, play online battles in NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution DEMO! Fight against rivals and score battle points to become a top player in the rankings. Single player arcade mode is also included. New characters introduced in this installment and Mecha-Naruto, new character designed by Masashi Kishimoto is also playable! Experience the evolved battle system including Ultimate Combo Jutsu that can be performed with a combination of set characters and True Awakening!
description.short: For a limited time, play online in NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution DEMO! Become a top player online or check out single player arcade mode!
